acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

addActor(uint256,address).details: manage actors that can execute methods of this relayer. Will mostly be relayers from the corresponding chains

params._chainHome: chain id of the home chain
params._isHomeRelayer: flag wheter this contract is deployed on the home chain or target chain
params._messageBus: address of the message bus from celer (if update needed, new deployment necessary)
params._relayerHome: address of the relayer on the home chain

deployFees(address,address,uint256,bytes.details: can only be executed by the home chain diamond

params._message: message to send to the message bus

deployFeesFeeCalc(address,bytes).details: can only be executed by the home chain diamond

params._message: message to send to the message bus

executeMessage(address,uint64,bytes,addr.details: this is only executed by the message bus from CELER IM

params._executor: trusted account which is configured in the executor

params._amount: The amount of tokens received at this contract through the cross-chain bridge.
params._executor: trusted account which is configured in the executor
params._message: Arbitrary message bytes originated from and encoded by the source app contract
params._sender: The address of the source app contract
params._srcChainId: The source chain ID where the transfer is originated from
params._token: The address of the token that comes out of the bridge

params._amount: The amount of tokens received at this contract through the cross-chain bridge.
params._sender: The address of the source app contract
params._srcChainId: The source chain ID where the transfer is originated from
params._token: The address of the token that comes out of the bridge

params._amount: The amount of the original transfer
params._message: The same message associated with the original transfer
params._token: The token address of the original transfer

params._asset: address of token that should be moved from the relayer

returns._isActor: flag if is actor or not

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

sendFees(address,uint256,uint32,bytes).details: can only be executred bei the target chain diamond

params._amount: amount of assets that gets send
params._message: message to send to the message bus

sendFeesFeeCalc(bytes).details: can only be executred bei the target chain diamond

params._message: message to send to the message bus

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

_actors.details: mapping of valid actors from specified chains

chainHome.details: chain id of the home chain

isHomeRelayer.details: flag whether this relayer is based on a target chain or a home chain (true=home chain)

relayerHome.details: address of the relayer on the home chain

addActor(uint256,address).notice: Adds an actor to the relayer

deployFees(address,address,uint256,bytes.notice: Deploys the fees to the desired chain

deployFeesFeeCalc(address,bytes).notice: Pre calculates upcoming fees for deploying fees

executeMessage(address,uint64,bytes,addr.notice: Executes the message on the desired chain

executeMessageWithTransfer(address,addre.notice: Called by MessageBus to execute a message with an associated token transfer. The contract is guaranteed to have received the right amount of tokens before this function is called.

executeMessageWithTransferFallback(addre.notice: Only called by MessageBus if         1. executeMessageWithTransfer reverts, or         2. executeMessageWithTransfer returns ExecutionStatus.Fail The contract is guaranteed to have received the right amount of tokens before this function is called.

executeMessageWithTransferRefund(address.notice: Called by MessageBus to process refund of the original transfer from this contract. The contract is guaranteed to have received the refund before this function is called.

forwardRefund(address,address,uint256).notice: Payout refund to receiver once token gets stuck

isActor(uint256,address).notice: Checks whether an actor is existing or not

nonce().notice: nonce for the transfers being created to avoid duplications

operator().notice: address of the operator which receives the funds in case every legit execution fails

removeActor(uint256).notice: Removes an actor based on the chain id

sendFees(address,uint256,uint32,bytes).notice: Sends the fees to the home chain

sendFeesFeeCalc(bytes).notice: Pre calculates upcoming fees for sending fees

userdoc.notice: this contract will manage the interaction with the IM service of CELER. It can only be called by the message bus or the diamonds on the desired chains
